components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to 9mobile in Nigeria

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to 9mobile in Nigeria. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE MESSAGING - SMS

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures on DiGi and Celcom Networks in Malaysia via Subset of Alpha Sender ID's and Longcodes.

incident_updates.body: We continue to investigate SMS delivery failures to DiGi and Celcom Networks in Malaysia via subset of Alpha Sender ID's and Longcodes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: France SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 20 February 2025 at 13:00 PST until 20 February 2025 at 15:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to France handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States SMS and MMS Carrier Maintenance - T-Mobile

incident_updates.body: The T-Mobile network in the United States is conducting an emergency maintenance from 21 February 2025 at 00:00 PST until 21 February 2025 at 05:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from T-Mobile United States handsets when sending via subset of long codes and short codes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Japan SMS Carrier Maintenance - SoftBank Mobile

incident_updates.body:
The SoftBank Mobile network in Japan is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 04 March 2025 at 06:00 PST until 17 March 2025 at 08:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from SoftBank Mobile Japan handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

04 March 2025 at 06:00 PST until 04 March 2025 at 07:00 PST
11 March 2025 at 07:00 PDT until 11 March 2025 at 08:00 PDT
12 March 2025 at 07:00 PDT until 12 March 2025 at 08:00 PDT
17 March 2025 at 07:00 PDT until 17 March 2025 at 08:00 PDT

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 03 February 2025 at 12:00 PST until 26 February 2025 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

03 February 2025 at 12:00 PST until 03 February 2025 at 16:00 PST
